<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2595</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Solar and Lunar eclipses.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Solar- und Mondeklipsen.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éclipses solaires et lunaires.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eclipses solares e lunares.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eclipse solari e lunari.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ηλιακές και σεληνιακές εκλείψεις.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Eclipses solares y lunares.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the movement of the sun and moon and the creation of eclipses</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eclipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Bewegung der Sonne und des Mondes 
und die Kreation von Eklipsen zeigt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre le mouvement du soleil et de 
la lune et la création des éclipses</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre o movimento do sol e da lua e a
criação dos eclipses</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra il movimento del sole e della 
luna e la creazione delle eclipse</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τη μετακίνηση του 
ήλιου και του φεγγαριού και τη δημιουργία των εκλείψεων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra el movimiento del sol y de la
luna y la creación de eclipses</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eklipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éclipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lune</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">eclipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">eclipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φεγγάρι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">eclipse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luna</string>
          </keyword>
